activities:
One Pica, Inc. is an e-commerce developer, our clients include both large and small entities with retail stores online.  Our clients sometimes need to transmit their customers' personal information to One Pica electronically, via email or direct file transmissions through our project management software system.  One Pica does not utilize or store such information on company servers for an extended period time, and may only use or access it during the web development process. 

One Pica, Inc. also transmits employment/HR information from the EU into the United States via electronic mail or electronic direct delivery methods.
